agenda.title: Blueprint Delivered: Reimagining Software Creation
agenda.description: Session that introduces the new Blueprint Delivered model and discuss why this change is needed. First establishing Blueprint's fundamental role in bridging business vision and technical execution, then describing the model and an overview of the different journeys (the four key use cases where Blueprint adds measurable value)
agenda.speaker: Scott Merrit

agenda.title: Blueprint to Value: Unified Delivery Excellence
agenda.description: The complete journey from blueprinting through value activation, emphasizes the collaborative nature of the delivery method and positions the session as the culmination of excellence across all roles.
agenda.speaker: Global Delivery Lead

agenda.title: Opening and Welcome Session
agenda.description: Overview of Key Topics, Setting Goals, Importance of Breakouts. Business Review and Outlook for the end of the year. Strategy for next year, Industries, products, trends. What's the impact for the team, for me as individual? What do we expect from the team to support the strategy? e.g. new way of working, Blueprint, Fixed prices, business consulting, Role of BA, Role of PDL, etc.
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Awards!
agenda.description: Live Poll (slido) awards. Hand-over awards to the individuals, Teams. Photo of winners
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Interactive session
agenda.description: What can I do to support our 2026 strategy? Group work at the tables, mixed groups. Expected results: Mini pitch on slido, online poll. Close
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Move to plenary room
agenda.description: Transition to main auditorium for closing session

agenda.title: Closing
agenda.description: All regions together in the aula
agenda.speaker: Walter

agenda.title: Blueprinting phase
agenda.description: What are the activities in the blueprinting phase and what accelerators do we have

agenda.title: High Fidelity Blueprint - The Delivery Standard
agenda.description: Show the high fidelity blueprint and walkthrough so people can validate if their homework assignment is close to it. How to get to the high fidelity blueprint and what does it mean. Show good examples and bad examples

agenda.title: High Fidelity Blueprint discussion
agenda.description: Practical session on refining the blueprint to HiFi. How do you know you are there, quality criteria, collaborating with client, coaching client.

agenda.title: Autonomous authoring phase
agenda.description: What are the activities in the autonomous authoring phase and what accelerators do we have

agenda.title: Value activation phase
agenda.description: What are the activities in the value activation phase and what accelerators do we have

agenda.title: Discovery & workflow identification
agenda.description:
Presentation: how to discover new workflows, identify the enterprise landscape and technical context
Challenge: scenario to identify hidden workflows and technical context
Discussion: common discovery challenges and commercial aspects

agenda.title: Value realization
agenda.description:
Estimator presentation on current state, expected future & hands-on
ROI model and success metrics (KPI per phase)

agenda.title: Delivery optimization and lessons learned
agenda.description:
Discussion: common delivery challenges in blueprint delivered
Presentation: lessons learned from blueprint delivered implementations

agenda.title: Blueprint to Value: Unified Delivery Excellence
agenda.description: the complete journey from blueprinting through value activation, emphasizes the collaborative nature of the delivery method, and positions the session as the culmination of excellence across all roles.
agenda.speaker: Scott/Dion

agenda.title: Opening
agenda.description: All EMEA PDLs, CSEs, RDs, Regional Managers, Opps,‚Ä¶. Opening with Welcome, Overview of Key Topics, Setting Goals
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Feedback and Learnings
agenda.description: Slido Session and Discussion, Quiz. Feedback of the first 2 days. Personal learnings
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Best Practice Session
agenda.description: Real Live Examples of strategic relevant opps, projects, presented by CSEs or PDLs. Testdrives, Blueprint Delivered, innovative delivery approach (50% reduces time‚Ä¶) Partner play, Fixed Price, etc, Learnings
agenda.speaker: RDs

agenda.title: Feedback session and Learnings
agenda.description: Flashlight

agenda.title: Coffee Break
agenda.description: Coffee and networking break
